markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- This ivory flute is adorned with many carvings of eyes. Each has jade pupils and a semiprecious stone as its iris. The eyes flutter open and closed when the flute is played, as if it held the eyes of many independent beings. While playing the flute, you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Seer's Flute **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
  • **1st** [_detect alignment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=65)
Seer's Flute (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
  • **3rd** [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=156), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
Seer's Flute (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [_read omens_](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)
  • **5th** [_inevitable disaster_](/Spells.aspx?ID=930), [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
name: Seer's Flute (Major)
